channel.title: Pandas on Coding Blog By Arnab Shil
channel.description: Recent content in Pandas on Coding Blog By Arnab Shil

item.title: Convert TFRecords to Pandas and Pandas to TFRecords
item.description: The TFRecord (Tensor Flow Records) format is a simple format for storing a sequence of binary records. It is much more efficient storage because it can take up less space than the original data. Aside from that, you can partition TFRecords into multiple files. In this article, we are going to see how you can convert Pandas Dataframe (essentially from a CSV) to TFRecords or vice versa.
